attributes.title: Horrid
attributes.review: This app is ATROCIOUS not only does it support a racist, sexist, and homophobic president but I would have expected more but what can you really expect from a ignorant president and his ignorants supporters 🤷🏽‍♀️

attributes.title: Greatest app ever!!
attributes.review: Love it! Keep America Great Again!

attributes.title: Ummmmm
attributes.review: So, I wanted to get this app to prove my opinions, but then I just saw a bunch of rats on the app! I figured out I downloaded the wrong app. The issue makes sense now.

attributes.title: Terrible App
attributes.review: Weird layout and design and makes me feel like I’m joining a cult when I enter the app. How have we allowed ourselves to live in George Orwell’s dystopian 1984?

attributes.title: if you want Trump straws
attributes.review:
you’ve come to the right place.
share with friends and get points (?!!)

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: Honestly thought this app would help me, but it rejected me when I said I was over 18 citing I was “too old for his taste”

attributes.title: Very bad🤢
attributes.review:
🧚✨🌈Trump 2020🌈✨🧚 But put it on a gravestone🌈✨🧚

Very bad app. Would not recommend. Please take it off the App Store, just like we should take this disgusting man out of office.

attributes.title: Horrifying
attributes.review: I’ve never thrown up so quickly and violently in my life. I miss the days when I could forget that this bloated cheetoh dust pile existed.

attributes.title: Just what is this!
attributes.review: It had bad quality no interesting things and just the same old Vote for me I’m trump thing.

attributes.title: ❤️🤍💙MAGA❤️🤍💙
attributes.review: I love Mr. Trump! He’s a boss with ambition & tremendous love for God & the great USA!! Best President in history 🇺🇸 #Trumpnation #4moreyears #ThankQ #proudrepublican #onenationunderGod
